# Hello there! Thank you for visiting my website! 

I am currently a Biological Sciences graduate student at Cal Poly Pomona in Dr. Juanita Jellyman’s lab and my thesis project is about understanding the impact of THC on the placenta in a mouse model. I am interested in pursuing a career in the biological data science field.
